title: Women from Barasat, West Bengal are taking control of the night after comments were made about the murdered lady doctor's whereabouts.
selftext:
The principal of RG Kar medical college had the audacity to  make a derogatory remarks like - what was she doing at that time of the night; about the murdered lady doctor. In response women from my hometown is taking control of the night. 

[It is the same place where Vidyasagar opened first girl's school in India. Make what you can of this remark]
